content:
Name Crit Effect Type
Broken Weapon Your weapon's current Hit Point are reduced to its Broken Threshold. If already broken, the weapon takes 3d6 damage, ignoring Hardness. Melee
My Spleeny Bits! You become wounded 1 or your wounded value increases by 1. Ranged
Frustration You take a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn. Unarmed
Beastly Rift Your spell becomes a summon animal spell of the same level. The animal attacks you. Spell
name: Critical Fumble Deck #15
